name: Mars: fam simulator
description:
Tired of living on earth! WELL! Mars Fam Simulator takes care of taking you to Mars and creating your own Martian farm! the project is in the prototype phase in singleplayer but the final version will be extended to a coop multiplayer and you will be able to create more farms on the planet mars!

currently only for Windows, but the final version and for Mec, Windows Store and Xbox!

to support our project do not hesitate to use the following links!

https://ko-fi.com/aeternumlight

https://www.patreon.com/m/aeternumlight
